name: Options_toStringTest
description: Unit tests for the toString method of the Options class.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithNoOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of Options when no options are added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithShortOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of Options when short options are added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithLongOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of Options when long options are added.

test_cases.name: testToStringWithBothShortAndLongOptions
test_cases.description: Tests the toString method of Options when both short and long options are added.
